message: Let's split it evenly. Fair deal, right?
I'll give you a slightly better offer. You can't expect everything to be 50/50, can you?
I'm willing to compromise, but I think 5500/4500 is a fairer split considering your previous offer. Let's wrap this up.
I'll meet you halfway between my previous offer and your latest one. This is my final offer, take it or leave it.
